Text:
Classification: Reality
Status: New Series
Network: TBS ( USA)
Airs: Thursdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 17, 2013
Episode Order: 8

Eleven folks battle in various challenges to be top nerd in this reality-competition series hosted by Robert Carradine and Curtis Armstrong, both of the film "Revenge of the Nerds." First up: The contestants explore their new digs, called Nerdvana; alliances are forged; a supersize game of strategy is played.
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31168)
